amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 415 of the bill which relates to project labor agreements (PLA's).
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 415 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaTourette amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 204 - 203 (Roll no. 413).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. LaTourette.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaTourette amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 204 - 203 (Roll no. 413).
